anya-e1102n3:1_0: Idāni “saddhammasavanampi cāti imassa saṁvaṇṇanākkamo sampatto tattha saddhammasavanampi
anya-e1102n3:1_1: ca loke dullabhameva tathā hi saddhammo nāma tividho hoti. Pariyattisaddhammo, paṭipattisaddhammo,
anya-e1102n3:1_2: paṭivedhasaddhammoti. Tattha pariyattisaddhammo nāma tepiṭakaṁ buddhavacanaṁ. Paṭipattisaddhammo
anya-e1102n3:1_3: nāma terasadhutaṅgāni asīti khandhakavattādayo abhisamācāravattādīni. Paṭivedhasaddhammo
anya-e1102n3:1_4: nāma catusaccappaṭivedho. Tesu pariyattisaddhammo dvinnaṁ saddhammānaṁ pubbaṅgamoyeva
anya-e1102n3:1_5: padaṭṭhānañca. Kasmā taṁmūlakattā tathā hi pariyattiyā asati paṭivedho nāma natthi.
anya-e1102n3:1_6: Pariyattiyā antarahitāya paṭipatti, paṭipattiyā antarahitāya adhigamo antaradhāyati.
anya-e1102n3:1_7: Kiṁ kāraṇā ayañhi pariyatti paṭipattiyā paccayo hoti. Paṭipattiadhigamassāpi pariyattiyeva
anya-e1102n3:1_8: pamāṇaṁ. Tattha paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi nahotipi. Ekasmiñhi kāle paṭivedhadharā
anya-e1102n3:1_9: bhikkhū bahū honti, “esa bhikkhu puthujjano”ti aṅguliṁ paharitvā dassetabbo hoti.
anya-e1102n3:1_10: Imasmiṁ yeva dīpe ekavāraṁ puthujjanabhikkhunāma nāhosi. Paṭipattipūrakāpi kadāci
anya-e1102n3:1_11: bahū honti kadāci appā. Iti paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi na hotipi. Sāsanassa
anya-e1102n3:1_12: ṭhitiyā pana pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṁ paṇḍito hi tepiṭakaṁ sutvā dvepi pūreti, yathā
anya-e1102n3:1_13: amhākaṁ bodhisatto āḷārassa santike pañca abhiññā satta ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā
anya-e1102n3:1_14: nevasaññānāsaññāyatana samāpattiyā parikammaṁ pucchi. So “na jānāmī”ti āha. Tato
anya-e1102n3:1_15: udakassa santikaṁ gantvā adhigatavisesaṁ saṁsanditvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa parikammaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_16: pucchi. So ācikkhi, tassa vacanasamanantarameva mahāsatto taṁ sampādesi evameva paññavā
anya-e1102n3:1_17: bhikkhu pariyattiṁ sutvā dvepi pūreti tasmā pariyattiyā ṭhitāya sāsanaṁ ṭhitaṁ hoti
anya-e1102n3:1_18: yathā mahātaḷākassa pāḷiyā thirāya udakaṁ na ṭhassatīti na vattabbaṁ udake sati padumādīni
anya-e1102n3:1_19: pupphāni na pupphissantīti na vattabbaṁ evameva mahātaḷākassa thirapāḷisadise tepiṭake
anya-e1102n3:1_20: buddhavacane sati mahātaḷāke udakasadisā paṭipattipūrakā kulaputtā natthīti na vattabbaṁ.
anya-e1102n3:1_21: Tesu sati mahātaḷākesu padumādīni pupphāni viya sotāpannādayo ariyapuggalā natthīti
anya-e1102n3:1_22: na vattabbaṁ, ekantato pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṁ pariyattiyā antarahitāya paṭipattipaṭivedhānaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_23: antaradhānato. Tattha pariyattināma tepiṭakaṁ buddhavacanaṁ sāṭṭhakathā pāḷiyāva
anya-e1102n3:1_24: sā tiṭṭhati, tāva pariyatti paripuṇṇā hoti. Gacchante kāle kaliyugarājāno adhammikā
anya-e1102n3:1_25: honti tesu adhammikesu rājāmaccādayo adhammikā honti tathā raṭṭhajanapadavāsinopi
anya-e1102n3:1_26: adhammikā etesaṁ adhammikatāya na devo sammā vassati, tato sassāni na sampajjanti.
anya-e1102n3:1_27: Tesu sampajjantesu paccayadāyakā bhikkhusaṅghassa paccaye dātuṁ na sakkonti. Bhikkhū
anya-e1102n3:1_28: paccayehi kilamantā antevāsike saṅgahetuṁ na sakkonti. Gacchante gacchante kāle pariyatti
anya-e1102n3:1_29: parihāyati, atthavasena dhāretuṁ na sakkonti, pāḷivaseneva dhārenti. Tato kāle gacchante
anya-e1102n3:1_30: pāḷimpi sakalaṁ dhāretuṁ na sakkonti paṭhamaṁ abhidhammapiṭakaṁ parihāyati. Parihāyamānaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_31: matthakato paṭṭhāya pariyatti hāyati paṭhamañhi mahāpakaraṇaṁ parihāyati. Tasmiṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_32: parihāyamāne yamakaṁ, kathāvatthu, puggalapaññatti, dhātukathā, vibhaṅgo, dhammasaṅgahoti
anya-e1102n3:1_33: evaṁ abhidhammapiṭake parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya suttantapiṭakaṁ parihāyati. Paṭhamañhi
anya-e1102n3:1_34: aṅguttaranikāyo parihāyati. Tasmimpi paṭhamaṁ ekādasanipāto…pe… tato ekanipātoti
anya-e1102n3:1_35: evaṁ aṅguttare parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya saṁyuttanikāyo parihāyati, paṭhamaṁ mahāvaggo
anya-e1102n3:1_36: parihāyati. Tato paṭṭhāya saḷāyatanavaggo, khandhavaggo, nidānavaggo, sagāthāvaggoti
anya-e1102n3:1_37: evaṁ saṁyuttanikāye parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya majjhimanikāyo parihāyati paṭhamañhi
anya-e1102n3:1_38: uparipaṇṇāsako parihāyati. Tato majjhimapaṇṇāsako, tato mūlapaṇṇāsakoti evaṁ majjhimanikāye
anya-e1102n3:1_39: parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya dīghanikāyo parihāyati, paṭhamañhi pāthiyavaggo parihāyati
anya-e1102n3:1_40: tato mahāvaggo, tato khandhakavaggoti dīghanikāye parihīne suttantapiṭakaṁ parihīnaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_41: nāma hoti. Vinayapiṭakena saddhiṁ jātakameva dhārenti. Vinayapiṭakaṁ lajjino dhārenti.
anya-e1102n3:1_42: Lābhakāmā pana suttante kathitepi sallakkhentā natthīti jātakameva dhārenti. Gacchante
anya-e1102n3:1_43: kāle jātakampi dhāretuṁ na sakkonti. Atha nesaṁ paṭhamaṁ vessantarajātakaṁ parihāyati.
anya-e1102n3:1_44: Tato paṭilomakkamena puṇṇakajākatakaṁ, mahānāradakassapajātakaṁ parihāyati. Vinayapiṭakameva
anya-e1102n3:1_45: dhārenti. Gacchante kāle tampi matthakato parihāyati paṭhamañhi parivāro parihāyati,
anya-e1102n3:1_46: tato khandhako bhikkhunīvibhaṅgo mahāvibhaṅgoti anukkamena uposathakkhandhakamattameva
anya-e1102n3:1_47: dhārenti, tadā pariyatti anantarahitāva hoti. Yāva pana manussesu catuppadikagāthāpi
anya-e1102n3:1_48: pavattati, tāva pariyatti anantarahitāva hoti. Yadā saddho pasanno rājā hatthikkhandhe
anya-e1102n3:1_49: suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakamhi sahassatthavikaṁ ṭhapāpetvā “buddhehi kathitaṁ catuppadikaṁ gāthaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_50: jānanto imaṁ sahassaṁ gaṇhatū”ti nagare bheriṁ carāpetvā gaṇhakaṁ alabhitvā ekavāraṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_51: carāpite na suṇantāpi honti asuṇantāpi, yāva tatiyaṁ carāpetvā gaṇhakaṁ alabhitvā
anya-e1102n3:1_52: rājapurisā sahassatthavikaṁ puna rājakulaṁ pavesenti, tadā pariyattiantarahitā nāma
anya-e1102n3:1_53: hoti. Evaṁ pariyattiyā antarahitāya paṭipattipi paṭivedhopi antarahitova hoti. Saddhammasavanassa
anya-e1102n3:1_54: dullabhabhāvo dhammasoṇḍakavatthunā dīpetabbo amhākaṁ kira sammāsambuddho kassapasammāsambuddhassa
anya-e1102n3:1_55: dhammarājassa sāsanantaradhānato nacireneva kālena bārāṇasirañño putto dhammasoṇḍakarājakumāro
anya-e1102n3:1_56: hutvā pituaccayena rajje patiṭṭhāya kassapadasabalena desitaṁ dhammaṁ sotukāmo hutvā
anya-e1102n3:1_57: māsamattaṁ rajjaṁ katvā amhākaṁ sammāsambuddho imasmiṁ yeva bhaddakappe rajjaṁ kāretvā
anya-e1102n3:1_58: devanagarasadise bārāṇasinagare cakkavattirajjasadisaṁ rajjaṁ karonto evaṁ cintesi…
anya-e1102n3:1_59: “mayhaṁ evarūpaṁ rajjaṁ kiṁ vilāsaṁ rajjānubhāvaṁ saddhammaviyogena, divākaravirahito
anya-e1102n3:1_60: ākāso viya, sasaṅkavirahitaratti viya, dāṭhāvirahitagajo viya, velantavirahitamahāsamuddo
anya-e1102n3:1_61: viya cakkhuvirahita susajjitavadanaṁ viya, sugandhavirahitapārichattapupphaṁ viya,
anya-e1102n3:1_62: catuakkharaniyamitadhammadesanāviyogena mayhaṁ idaṁ rajjaṁ na sobhatī”ti cintetvā
anya-e1102n3:1_63: suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakena sahassatthavikaṁ bhaṇḍakaṁ susajjitaṁ maṅgalahatthikumbhe ṭhapetvā
anya-e1102n3:1_64: bārāṇasīnagare mahāvīthiyaṁ bheriṁ carāpeti “ekapadikaṁ vā dvipadikaṁ vā tipadikaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_65: vā catuppadikaṁ vā dhammapadaṁ jānantassa dammī”ti evaṁ bheriṁ carāpetvā dhammajānanakaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_66: alabhitvā punappunaṁ dvisahassaṁ tisahassaṁ yāva satasahassaṁ koṭi dve sahassakoṭi,
anya-e1102n3:1_68: alabhitvā attano suvaṇṇapīṭhakaṁ setacchattaṁ cajitvāpi dhammadesakaṁ alabhitvā rajjasiriṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_69: pahāya attānaṁ cajitvā “dhammadesakassa dāso hutvāpi dhammaṁ sossāmī”ti vatvā evampi
anya-e1102n3:1_70: dhamma desakaṁ alabhitvā vippaṭisārī hutvā “kiṁ me saddhammaviyogena rajjenāti amaccānaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_71: rajjaṁ niyyātetvā saddhammagavesako hutvā dhammasoṇḍakamahārājā mahāvanaṁ pāvisi
anya-e1102n3:1_73: vejayantapāsādo saheva kiṇṇikāya kampo ahosi, paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṁ uṇhākāraṁ ahosi.
anya-e1102n3:1_74: Sakkodevarājā kenakāraṇena paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṁ uṇhākāraṁ ahosī”ti cintetvā attano
anya-e1102n3:1_75: sahassanettena devamanussesu vitthāretvā olokento dhammagavesako hutvā vanaṁ paviṭṭhaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_76: dhammasoṇḍakamahārājānaṁ disvā cintesi… “ajja me attānampi jahāya rakkhasavesaṁ māpetvā
anya-e1102n3:1_77: etaṁ aniccaparidīpanaṁ jātijarābyādhimaraṇaṁ sakalasarīre dosaṁ dassetvā dhammaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_78: desetvā etaṁ sakarajjeyeva patiṭṭhāpetabba”nti cintetvā sakko devarājā yakkhasarūpaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_79: māpetvā bodhisattassa abhimukho avidūre attānaṁ dassesi. Taṁ disvā dhammasoṇḍakamahārājā
anya-e1102n3:1_80: evaṁ cintesi… “evaṁrūpo nāma rakkhaso dhammaṁ jāneyyā”ti, cintetvā avidūre ṭhāne
anya-e1102n3:1_81: ṭhatvā pucchāmīti rakkhasena saddhiṁ sallapanto āha “sāmipuññadevarāja imasmiṁ pana
anya-e1102n3:1_82: vanaghane vasanakadevarājā kiṁ nukho dhammaṁ jānāsī”ti, devatā “mahārāja dhammaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_83: jānāmī”ti āha. “Yadi dhammaṁ jānāsi, mayhaṁ dhammakathaṁ kathethā”ti āha. “Ahaṁ tuyhaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_84: dhammaṁ kathessāmi, tvaṁ mayhaṁ kīdisaṁ dhammakathikassa sakkāraṁ karissasī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n3:1_85: “Evaṁ sante mayhaṁ dhammaṁ kathetvā pacchā mayhaṁ sarīre maṁsaṁ khādissasī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n3:1_86: “Ahaṁ mahārāja chāto hutvā dhammaṁ kathetuṁ na sakkomī”ti āha. “Yadi tumhe paṭhamaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_87: maṁsaṁ khādatha, dhammaṁ ko suṇissatī”ti āha. Puna so rakkhaso “nāhaṁ dhammaṁ desetuṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_88: sakkomī”ti. Puna rājā “mayhaṁ dhammapaṭilābhañca tumhākaṁ maṁsapaṭilābhañca tumhe
anya-e1102n3:1_89: jānitvā mayhaṁ dhammaṁ desethā”ti āha. Atha sakko devarājā “sādhu hothā”ti vatvā
anya-e1102n3:1_90: avidūre ṭhāne ubbedhena tigāvutamattaṁ mahantaṁ añjanapabbataṁ māpetvā evamāha… “sace
anya-e1102n3:1_91: mahārāja imaṁ pabbatamuddhaniṁ ārūyha ākāsā uppatitvā tvaṁ mama mukhe patissasi,
anya-e1102n3:1_92: ahaṁ te ākāsagatakāle dhammaṁ desessāmi, evaṁ sante tuyhañca dhammappalābho mayhañca
anya-e1102n3:1_93: maṁsapaṭilābho bhavissatī”ti āha. Tassa kathaṁ sutvā dhammasoṇḍakamahārājā “anamatagge
anya-e1102n3:1_94: saṁsāre puriso hutvā adhammasamaṅgī hutvā adhammasseva atthāya pāṇātipāto adinnādāno
anya-e1102n3:1_95: kāmesumicchācāro sūkariko orabbhiko sākuṇi ko coro paradāriko taṁ gahetvā sīsacchinnānaṁ
anya-e1102n3:1_96: lohitaṁ catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakatopi bahutaraṁ mātāpituādīnampi manāpānaṁ atthāya
anya-e1102n3:1_97: rodantānaṁ assu catūsumahāsamuddesu udakatopi bahutaraṁ, imaṁ pana sarīraṁ dhammassa
anya-e1102n3:1_98: atthāya vikkiṇāmi taṁ mahapphalañca manāpañcā”ti cintetvā “sādhu mārisa evaṁ karomī”ti
anya-e1102n3:1_99: pabbataṁ ārūyha pabbatagge ṭhito “mama rajjena saddhiṁ mayhaṁ sajīvasarīraṁ saddhammassatthāya
anya-e1102n3:1_100: dassāmī”ti somanasso hutvā “dhammaṁ kathethā”ti saddhammatthāya jīvitaṁ pariccajitvā
anya-e1102n3:1_101: ākāsato uppatitvā dhammaṁ kathethāti āha. Atha sakko devarājā sakattabhāvena sabbālaṅkārehi
anya-e1102n3:1_102: paṭimaṇḍito ativiya sotuṁ somanasso ākāsato patantaṁ dibbaphassena parāmasanto urena
anya-e1102n3:1_103: paṭiggaṇhitvā devalokaṁ netvā paṇḍukambalasilāsane nisīdāpetvā mālāgandhādīhi pūjetvā
anya-e1102n3:4_0: Evaṁ sakko dhammasoṇḍakamahārājassa dhammaṁ desetvā devalokasampattiṁ dassetvā devalokato
anya-e1102n3:4_1: ānetvā sakarajje patiṭṭhāpetvā appamādena ovaditvā devalokameva agamāsi evaṁ saddhammasavanassāpi
anya-e1102n3:4_2: dullabhabhāvo veditabbo. Evaṁ pariyattiantaradhānena paṭipatti paṭivedhāpi antaradhāyanti.
anya-e1102n3:4_3: Ettha ca tīṇi parinibbānāni veditabbāni katamāni tīṇi parinibbānāni. Kilesaparinibbānaṁ,
anya-e1102n3:4_5: hoti, bhagavā hi bodhimaṇḍeyeva vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena
anya-e1102n3:4_11: saṅkhepato vā pañca kilesaabhisaṅkhārakhandhamaccudevaputtamāre asesato hatā vihatā
anya-e1102n3:4_12: anabhāvaṁkatā tasmā sabbepi kilesā bodhimaṇḍeyeva nibbānaṁ nirodhaṁ gacchantīti kilesanibbānaṁ
anya-e1102n3:4_13: bodhimaṇḍeyeva hoti ettha ca bodhīti arahattamaggaññāṇaṁ adhippetaṁ tathā hi sabbesampi
anya-e1102n3:4_14: buddhapaccekabuddhaariyasāvakānaṁ arahattamaggakkhaṇeyeva sabbepi kilesā asesaṁ nirodhaṁ
anya-e1102n3:4_15: nibbānaṁ gacchanti tepi buddhā ugghaṭitaviññūvibhajjitaññūneyyavasena tividhā honti
anya-e1102n3:6: Tatiyo neyyo nāmena, bodhisatto tidhā mato.
anya-e1102n3:9: Mato neyyo saddhādhiko nāma, bodhisattā ime tayo;
anya-e1102n3:13: Aṭṭhame ca asaṅkhyeyye, kappe ca satasahasse;
anya-e1102n3:16: Neyyo tu bodhisatto ca, soḷase asaṅkhyeyye.
anya-e1102n3:19_1: asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca, majjhimaparicchedena aṭṭha asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca,
anya-e1102n3:19_3: veditabbāti vuttaṁ tesu paññādhiko cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca, saddhādhiko
anya-e1102n3:19_5: veditabbaṁ. Tattha paññādhiko yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu saṁsarantopi paññābahullavasena
anya-e1102n3:19_6: sampannajjhāsaya sambhavato khippaññeva tassa sambodhi. Saddhādhiko pana mandapaññattā
anya-e1102n3:19_7: assaddahitabbepi saddahati, tasmā tassa mandaññeva sambodhi. Vīriyādhiko pana ubhayamando
anya-e1102n3:19_8: assaddahitabbampi saddahati, akattabbampi karoti, rājā passenadīkosalo yathā so hi
anya-e1102n3:19_9: sabbaññubuddhe dharamāneyeva agamanīyampi paradāraṁ gantuṁ cittaṁ uppādetvā paraṁ
anya-e1102n3:19_10: jīvitā voropetuṁ āraddho nerayikānaṁ viravantānaṁ du-sa-na-soti saddampi sutvā ativimūḷho
anya-e1102n3:19_11: sabbaññubuddhaṁ ṭhapetvā micchādiṭṭhibrāhmaṇaṁ pucchitvā tassa vacanena sabbajanānaṁ
anya-e1102n3:19_12: yaññatthāya dukkhaṁ uppādesi ko panavādo anuppanne buddhe, tathā hi esa kassapabhagavato
anya-e1102n3:19_13: sāsanantaradhānena andhabhūte loke bārāṇasiyaṁ rājā hutvāpi nigrodharukkhadevatāya
anya-e1102n3:19_14: yaññatthāya ekasatarājāno mahesīhi saddhiṁ māretuṁ āraddho. Evaṁ vīriyādhiko ubhayamando,
anya-e1102n3:19_15: tasmā tassa sambodhi atimandoti evaṁ paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikavasena kālassāpi
anya-e1102n3:19_16: rassadīghabhāvo veditabboti. Pacchimanayoeva pasaṁsitabboti ayamettha amhākaṁ attanomati.
anya-e1102n3:19_17: Khandhaparinibbānaṁ pana kusinārāya upavattane mallānaṁ sālavane yamakasālānamantare
anya-e1102n3:19_19: mahāvipākacittena abyākatena carimakaṁ katvā katthaci bhave paṭisandhiviññāṇassa
anya-e1102n3:19_20: anantarapaccayo hutvā kammataṇhākilesehi anupādāno sabbupadhipaṭinissaggo upādinnakakkhandhapariccāgo
anya-e1102n3:19_21: hotīti veditabbaṁ. Vitthāro pana dīghanikāye mahāvagge mahāparinibbānasuttavaṇṇanāyaṁ
anya-e1102n3:19_22: oloketabbo. Tattha videsaṁ gacchanto puriso sabbaṁ ñātijanaṁ āliṅgetvā sīse cumbitvā
anya-e1102n3:19_23: gacchati viya bhagavāpi nibbānapuraṁ pavisanto sabbepi catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasamāpattiyo
anya-e1102n3:19_24: anavasesaṁ samāpajjitvā yāva saññāvedayitaṁ, tatopi vuṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ
anya-e1102n3:19_25: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgacittena abyākatena dukkhasaccena
anya-e1102n3:19_26: parinibbāyi. Pāḷiyaṁ pana “catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā samanantarā bhagavā parinibbāyī”ti
anya-e1102n3:19_27: vuttaṁ tattha dve samanantarā jhānasamanantarā, paccavekkhaṇasamanantarāti. Tattha
anya-e1102n3:19_28: jhānā vuṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṁ otiṇṇassa tattheva parinibbānaṁ jhānasamanantaraṁ nāma.
anya-e1102n3:19_29: Jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā puna jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgaṁ otiṇṇassa tattheva parinibbānaṁ
anya-e1102n3:19_30: paccavekkhaṇasamanantaraṁ nāma. Bhagavā pana jhānasamanantarā apari nibbāyittā paccavekkhaṇasamanantarameva
anya-e1102n3:19_31: parinibbāyīti veditabbaṁ, tenevāha “bhagavā pana jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā jhānā vuṭṭhāya
anya-e1102n3:19_32: jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgacittena abyākatena dukkhasaccena parinibbāyī”ti.
anya-e1102n3:19_33: Ettha bhagavato parinibbānacittassa kiṁ ārammaṇaṁ kammaṁ vā hoti, udāhu kammanimittagatinimittāni,
anya-e1102n3:24_0: Imissāgāthāya “yaṁ yo muni anejo santi nibbānaṁ ārabbha kālaṁ akarī”ti yojetvā bhagavato
anya-e1102n3:24_2: anārahattā “nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa vodānassa maggassa ārammaṇapaccayenapaccayo, nibbānaṁ
anya-e1102n3:24_3: phalassa āvajjanāyā”ti paṭṭhānapāḷiyā javanaāvajjanānameva adhippetattā tasmā ettha
anya-e1102n3:24_4: “yaṁ yo muni phalasamāpattiyā anejo anejasaṅkhāto taṇhārahito santiṁ nibbānaṁ ārabbha
anya-e1102n3:24_5: ārammaṇaṁ katvā kālaṁ asītivassaparimāṇaṁ akari atikkamī”ti yojanā kātabbā. Keci
anya-e1102n3:24_6: pana evaṁ vadanti… “katthaci pana anuppajjamānassa khīṇāsavassa yathopaṭṭhitaṁ nāmarūpadhammādikameva
anya-e1102n3:24_7: cutipariyosānānaṁ gocarabhāvaṁ gacchati, na kamma-kammanimittādayo”ti vuttattā kammanittagatinimittāni
anya-e1102n3:24_8: arahato cuticittassa ārammaṇabhāvaṁ na gacchantīti tampi ayuttameva ayañhetthattho
anya-e1102n3:24_9: katthaci pana bhave anuppajjamānassa khīṇāsavassa arahato yathā yathā yena yena pakārena
anya-e1102n3:24_11: gacchati, puna bhavābhinibbattiyā abhāvato. Kiṁ kāraṇaṁ bhūtāni kammakammanimittagatinimittāni
anya-e1102n3:24_12: gocarabhāvaṁ na gacchantīti. Cuticittassa pana paṭisandhicittena gahitaṁ atītārammaṇameva
anya-e1102n3:24_13: gocarabhāvaṁ gacchati. “Nāmarūpādikamevā ti ettha nāma”nti cittacetasikanibbānaṁ
anya-e1102n3:24_14: rūpanti aṭṭhārasavidhaṁ rūpaṁ saṅgaṇhāti. Nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpā. Nāmarūpā ca te
anya-e1102n3:24_15: dhammā ceti tathā. Te ādi yesaṁ teti nāmarūpadhammādi tameva nāmarūpadhammādikaṁ.
anya-e1102n3:24_16: Ādisaddena cha paññattiyo saṅgaṇhāti, tena nibbānampi arahato maraṇāsannakāle kriyajavanassapi
anya-e1102n3:24_17: ārammaṇabhāvo bhaveyyāti amhākaṁ khanti vīmaṁsitvā pana gahetabbaṁ. Bhagavato nibbānacittassa
anya-e1102n3:24_18: pana tusitapurato cavitvā sirīmahāmāyāya kucchimhi vasitapaṭisandhicittena gahitārammaṇameva
anya-e1102n3:24_19: ārammaṇaṁ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ tañca kho gatinimittameva, na kammakammanimittāni. Yuttitopi
anya-e1102n3:24_20: āgamatopi gatinimittameva yujjati tathā hi tusitapureyeva setaketudevaputto hutvā
anya-e1102n3:24_22: ṭhatvā pariyosāne pañca pubbanimittāni disvā suddhāvāse arahantabrahmunā dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi
anya-e1102n3:27_0: Yāciyamāno “kālaṁ dīpañca desañca, kulaṁ mātarameva cā”ti vuttāni pañca mahāvilokanāni
anya-e1102n3:27_1: viloketvā tusitapurato cavitvā āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāyaṁ uttarāsāḷhanakkhatteneva saddhiṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_3: sadisena mahāvipākacittena paṭisandhiṁ aggahesi. Tadārammaṇāsannavīthito pubbabhāge
anya-e1102n3:27_4: ālokitāni kāladīpadesakulamātaravasena imāni pañca paṭisandhicittassa gatinimittārammaṇabhāvena
anya-e1102n3:27_5: gocarabhāvaṁ gacchantīti amhākaṁ khanti tanninnatappoṇatappabbhāravasena bāhullappavattito
anya-e1102n3:27_7: abhimukhībhūtaṁ bhavantare paṭisandhijanakaṁ kammaṁ vā taṁ kammakaraṇakāle rūpādikamupaladdhapubbamupakaraṇabhūtañca
anya-e1102n3:27_8: kammanimittaṁ vā anantaramuppajjamānabhave upalabhitabbaṁ upabhogabhūtaṁ gatinimittaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_9: vā kammabalena channaṁ dvārānamaññatarasmiṁ paccupaṭṭhāsi, tato paraṁ tameva tathopaṭṭhitamālambaṇaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_10: ārabbha vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṁ parisuddhaṁ vā, upakkiliṭṭhaṁ vā upapajjitabbabhavānurūpaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_11: tatthoṇataṁva cittasantānamabhiṇhaṁ pavattati bāhullena. Tameva vā pana janakabhūtaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_12: kammaṁ abhinavakaraṇavasena dvārappattaṁ hoti. Paccāsannamaraṇassa pana tassa vīthicittāvasāne
anya-e1102n3:27_14: nirujjhati. Tasmiṁ niruddhāvasāne tassānantarameva tathā gahitamālambaṇamārabbha
anya-e1102n3:27_18: patiṭṭhāti bhavantare”ti vuttaṁ. Tattha “tatthoṇataṁva cittasantānamabhiṇhaṁ pavattati
anya-e1102n3:27_19: bāhullenā”ti iminā kammabalena upaṭṭhitaṁ gatinimittaṁ maraṇāsannavīthito pubbe ekāhadvīhādivasena
anya-e1102n3:27_20: sattāhampi, sattāhato uttaripi uppajjate vāti dasseti tathā hi parisuddhaṁ vā upakkiliṭṭhaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_21: vā vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṁ gatinimittaṁ cirakālampi tiṭṭhati, ariyagālatissacoraghātakādayo
anya-e1102n3:27_22: viya tathā hi ariyagālatisso nāma upāsako sīhaḷadīpe attano bhariyāya sumanāya saddhiṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_23: yāvajīvaṁ dānādi puññakammāni katvā āyūhapariyosāne ariyagālatissassa maraṇamañce
anya-e1102n3:27_24: nipannassa chadevalokato rathaṁ ānetvā attano attano devalokaṁ vaṇṇesuṁ. Upāsako
anya-e1102n3:27_25: devatānaṁ kathaṁ sutvā tusitapurato āhaṭarathaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesarathe “gahetvā gacchathā”ti
anya-e1102n3:27_26: āha. Sumanā pana attano sāmikassa vacanaṁ sutvā “kiṁ tissa maraṇāsanne vilāpaṁ akāsī”ti
anya-e1102n3:27_27: āha. Tisso attano bhariyāya kathaṁ sutvā āha… “ahaṁ vilāpaṁ na karomi, devalokato
anya-e1102n3:27_28: devatā cha rathe ānesuṁ tāhi devatāhi saddhaṁ kathemī”ti. Taṁ napassāmi kuhi”nti
anya-e1102n3:27_29: vutte pupphadāmaṁ āharāpetvā ākāse khipāpesi. Sā taṁ pupphadāmaṁ rathasīse olambamānaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_30: disvā gabbhaṁ pavisitvā sayane sayitvā nāsikavātaṁ sannirujjhitvā cavitvā pāturahosi.
anya-e1102n3:27_31: Sā attano sāmikassa sāsanaṁ pesesi… “ahaṁ pana paṭhamaṁ āgatomhi, tvaṁ kasmā cirāyasī”ti.
anya-e1102n3:27_32: Ubhopi rathe ṭhatvā sabbe olokentānaṁyeva tusitapuraṁ agamaṁsu. Imasmiñhi vatthusmiṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_33: sāmikassa upaṭṭhitagatinimittaṁ bhariyāya pākaṭaṁ hutvā puretaratusitapure nibbattitvā
anya-e1102n3:27_34: sāmikassa sāsanaṁ pesesi tena ariyagālatissassa cirakālaṁ gatinimittaṁ upaṭṭhātīti
anya-e1102n3:27_35: veditabbaṁ. Manussaloke hi cirakālaṁ tusitapure muhuttaṁva hoti. Evaṁ parisuddhaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_36: vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṁ gatinimittaṁ cirakālaṁ pavattati iminā nayena duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayadhammikaupsakādīnampi
anya-e1102n3:27_37: vatthu vitthāretabbaṁ. Coraghātakassa pana mahāniraye vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṁ nerayaggijālādikaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_38: sattāhaṁ upaṭṭhāti. Sāvatthinagare kira pañcasatā corā bahinagare corakammaṁ karonti.
anya-e1102n3:27_39: Athekadivasaṁ janapadapuriso tesaṁ abbhantaro hutvā corakammaṁ akāsi, tadā te sabbepi
anya-e1102n3:27_40: rājapurisā aggahesuṁ. Rājā te disvā “tumhākaṁ antare ime sabbe māretuṁ samatthassa
anya-e1102n3:27_41: jīvitaṁ dammī”ti āha. Pañcasatā corā aññamaññaṁ sambandhā aññamaññaṁ sahāyakāti aññamaññaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_42: māretuṁ na icchiṁsu, janapadamanusso pana “ahaṁ māremī”ti vatvā sabbe māresi. Rājā
anya-e1102n3:27_43: tassa tussitvā coraghātakakammaṁ adāsi. So pañcavīsativassāni coraghātakakammaṁ ākāsi.
anya-e1102n3:27_44: Rājā tassa mahallakoti vatvā aññassa coraghātaka kammaṁ dāpesi. So coraghātakakammā
anya-e1102n3:27_45: apanīto aññatarassa santike nāsikavātaṁ uggaṇhitvā hatthapādakaṇṇanāsādīhi chinditabbānaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_46: ūrūthanakaṭṭhānaṁ bhindantamāretabbayuttānaṁ nāsikavātaṁ vissajjetvā māretabbaṁ mantaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_47: labhi. So rājānaṁ ārocetvā nāsikavātena coraghātakakammaṁ karontasseva tiṁsa vassāni
anya-e1102n3:27_48: atikkami. So pacchā mahallako hutvā maraṇamañce nipajji “sattadivasena kālaṁ karissatī”ti.
anya-e1102n3:27_49: Maraṇakāle mahantaṁ vedanaṁ ahosi. So mahāniraye nibbatto viya mahāsaddaṁ katvā dukkhito
anya-e1102n3:27_50: hoti. Tassa saddena bhītā manussā ubhatopasse gehaṁ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṁsu. Tassa maraṇadivase
anya-e1102n3:27_51: sāriputtatthero dibbacakkhunā lokaṁ olokento etassa kālaṁ katvā mahāniraye nibbattamānaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_52: disvā tassa anukampaṁ paṭicca gehadvāre pākaṭo ahosi. So kujjhitvā nāsikavātaṁ vissajjesi.
anya-e1102n3:27_53: Yāva tatiyaṁ vissajjamānopi vissajjāpetuṁ asakkonto theraṁ atirekena virocamānaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_54: disvā cittaṁ pasādetvā pāyāsaṁ therassa dāpesi. Thero maṅgalaṁ vaḍḍhetvā agamāsi.
anya-e1102n3:27_55: Coraghātako therassa dinnadānaṁ anussaritvā cavitvā sagge nibbatti, nirayajālādayo
anya-e1102n3:27_56: antaradhāyanti. So anāgatepi paccekabuddho bhavissati. Evaṁ upakkiliṭṭhaṁ vā vipaccamāna
anya-e1102n3:27_57: kakammānurūpaṁ gatinimittampi sattāhaparamaṁ upaṭṭhāti. Atthikehi pana sahassavatthu
anya-e1102n3:27_58: sagāthāvaggesu oloketabbo. Bhagavato pana parisuddhaṁ mettāpubbabhāgassa somanassa
anya-e1102n3:27_59: ñāṇasampayuttakusalassa kammassa vegena kāladīpadesakulamātaravasena imāni pañcagatinimittāni
anya-e1102n3:27_60: cirakālaṁ hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Cirakālanti manussaloke sattāhamattaṁ, tusitapuremuhuttameva,
anya-e1102n3:27_61: tathāpi manussaloke sattāhamatte kāle devatānaṁ pañcapubbanimittāni paññāyanti tañca
anya-e1102n3:27_62: kho puññavantānaṁyeva paññāyanti, na sabbesaṁ manussaloke puññavantānaṁ rājarājamahāmattādīnaṁ
anya-e1102n3:27_63: viya taṁ disvā mahesakkhā devatā jānanti, na appesakkhā, manussaloke nemittakā brāhmaṇapaṇḍitādayoviya.
anya-e1102n3:27_64: Mahesakkhā devatā taṁ pubbanimittaṁ disvā nandavanaṁ netvā “kālo devā”ti ādīhi yācanti.
anya-e1102n3:27_65: Mahāsakko tattheva nandavanuyyāne kāladīpadesakulamātaravasena pañca viloketvā cavitvā
anya-e1102n3:27_66: tamārammaṇaṁ katvā mahāmāyāya kucchimhi paṭisandhiṁ aggahesīti sanniṭṭhānamavagantabbaṁ.
anya-e1102n3:28_0: Tattha kālanti manussaloke ekūnatiṁsatime vasse vesākhapuṇṇamadivase buddho bhavissāmīti
anya-e1102n3:28_1: kālaṁ olokesi. Dīpanti jambudīpeyeva bhavissāmi, na aññadīpesūti dīpaṁ olokesi. Desanti
anya-e1102n3:28_2: majjhimadeseyeva, tañca kho mahābodhimaṇḍeyeva, na aññadeseti desaṁ olokesi. Kulanti
anya-e1102n3:28_3: dve kulāni khattiyakulabrāhmaṇakulavasena. Tattha yasmiṁ kāle khattiyakulaṁ loke
anya-e1102n3:28_4: seṭṭhabhāvena “ayameva loke aggo”ti sammannati, tadā khattiyakuleyeva buddhā uppajjanti.
anya-e1102n3:28_5: Yasmiṁ pana kāle brāhmaṇakulaṁ ayameva loke aggoti, tadā brāhmaṇakuleyeva buddhā
anya-e1102n3:28_6: uppajjanti. Idāni pana khattiyakulameva aggoti sammannanti. Khattiyakulepi sakyarājānova
anya-e1102n3:28_7: loke uttamā, asambhinnakhattiyakulattā tasmā sakyarājakuleyeva bhavissāmīti kulaṁ
anya-e1102n3:28_8: olokesi. Mātaranti mama mātaraṁ dasa māsāni satta ca divasāni ṭhassati, etthantare
anya-e1102n3:28_9: mama mātuyā arogo bhavissatīti mātarampi olokesi. Bodhisattamātā pana pacchimavaye
anya-e1102n3:28_10: ṭhitā. Evaṁ yuttitopi āgamatopi bhagavato nibbānacittassa paṭasandhicittena gahitanimittameva
anya-e1102n3:31_1: anāgate bhavissati sāsanassa hi osakkanakāle imasmiṁ tambapaṇṇidīpe dhātuyo sannipatitvā
anya-e1102n3:31_2: mahācetiyato nāgadīpe rājāyatanacetiyaṁ, tato mahābodhipallaṅkaṁ gamissanti. Nāgabhavanatopi
anya-e1102n3:31_3: devalokatopi dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅkameva gamissanti sāsapamattāpi dhātuyo antarā
anya-e1102n3:31_4: na nassissanti, sabbā dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅke rāsibhūtā suvaṇṇakkhandhā viya ekagghanā
anya-e1102n3:31_5: hutvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajjissanti, tā dasasahassalokadhātuṁ pharissanti. Tato
anya-e1102n3:31_6: dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devatā sannipatitvā ''ajja satthā parinibbāyati ajja sāsanaṁ
anya-e1102n3:31_7: osakkati pacchimadassanaṁ idaṁ amhāka”nti dasabalassa parinibbutadivasato mahantataraṁ
anya-e1102n3:31_8: kāruññaṁ karissanti ṭhapetvā anāgāmikhīṇāsave avasesā sakattabhāvena sandhāretuṁ
anya-e1102n3:31_9: nāsakkhiṁsu, dhātusarīrato tejodhātu uṭṭhahitvā yāva brahmalokā uggacchissati. Sāsapamattāyapi
anya-e1102n3:31_10: dhātuyā sati ekajālā bhavissati dhātūsu pariyādānaṁ gatāsu pacchijjissati. Evaṁ mahantaṁ
anya-e1102n3:31_11: ānubhāvaṁ dassetvā dhātūsu antarahitāsu sāsanaṁ antarahitaṁ nāma hoti. Yāva evaṁ
anya-e1102n3:31_12: na antaradhāyati, tāva anantaradhānameva sāsanaṁ. Parinibbānakālato paṭṭhāya yāva
anya-e1102n3:31_13: sāsapamattā dhātu tiṭṭhati, tāva buddhakālato pacchāti na veditabbaṁ dhātūsu hi ṭhitāsu
anya-e1102n3:31_14: buddhā ṭhitā va honti, tasmā etthantare aññassa buddhassa uppatti nivāritāva hoti. Teneva vadāma.
anya-e1102n3:35: Yo karoti samaṁ pūjaṁ, phalaṁ tāsa samaṁ siyā’ti.
